articles.description: Molly Shannon has written the candid memoir "Hello, Molly!" She says while "some comedians push people away," she likes to "share stuff to connect."
articles.content: Molly Shannon wasn’t afraid to throw herself onto a pile of metal chairs on “Saturday Night Live” as the overzealous Catholic school girl Mary Katherine Gallagher, who longed to be a "superstar." In … [+5774 chars]
